import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create inventory stock record"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/inventory/inventories/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new inventory stock record for a catalog item at a specific location.

**Note**: This API is marked as deprecated (v1.0).

**Prerequisites**:
- **InventoryItemId**: Use [POST /api/v1.0/inventory-items/query](/docs/api/inventory/query-inventory-items) to find catalog items
- **LocationId**: Use [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2) to find locations
- **InventoryStateTypeId**: Use reference data endpoints to get valid state type IDs

**Workflow**:
1. Search for the catalog item to get `InventoryItemId`
2. Search for the target location to get `LocationId`
3. Submit the create request with quantity, cost, and tracking settings

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Inventory stock record to create.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an inventory stock record.","properties":{"InventoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier of the inventory record (required for updates, generated on create)."},"InventoryItemId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the catalog item."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the location where stock is stored."},"SupplierId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the associated supplier."},"TrackInventory":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to actively track inventory for this stock entry."},"QuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of units available."},"AverageCost":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Average cost per unit."},"MinQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Minimum quantity threshold for reorder alerts."},"MaxQuantityAvailable":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum quantity threshold for overstock alerts."},"InventoryStateTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier describing the inventory state."}},"title":"UpdateInventoryRequest"},"example":{"InventoryItemId":"2b0e2cb0-4cb5-4b0f-9a7d-2c9f2ac830d2","LocationId":"31d1574a-2243-e611-a93b-a45e60e682da","QuantityAvailable":100,"AverageCost":25.5,"TrackInventory":true,"MinQuantityAvailable":10,"MaxQuantityAvailable":500,"InventoryStateTypeId":"a24a0fa3-df8d-ec11-ba9e-88665a256e9d"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
